Content-Type: text/plain; charset=UTF-8

I have a Junit test classes with differening amount of unit test methods in
it.

I want to detect when a class finishes running its test methods, so that I
can do a computation.

How can I detect when a class finishes its unit test methods ? Via teardown
method or something similar ? And how can I similary understand that a test
suite made of Junit test classes finishes its call ?

Thanks

--047d7b5d49762328030527050300
